title: Town Vanishing
story: The small town of Hollow Creek had long been known for its peaceful and tight-knit community.
That peace was shattered when a local resident, Mary Johnson, mysteriously disappeared without a trace.
Law enforcement has been baffled by the lack of leads, and the townspeople are on edge as the search for Mary continues.

suspect.name: James Davis
suspect.alibi: James claims he was out of town on a business trip at the time of Mary's disappearance.
suspect.confirmation: No one has been able to confirm James' whereabouts during that time.

witness.name: Sarah Roberts
witness.observation: I saw Mary arguing with someone by the old oak tree the night she went missing.
witness.description: Sarah is known for her keen attention to detail and has a solid reputation in town.

npcs.name: Lucas Bennett
npcs.dialogue: I hope they find Mary soon. This has everyone on edge.

npcs.name: Emily Parker
npcs.dialogue: I heard some strange noises coming from the woods that night. It sent shivers down my spine.

clues.Mary's house: An overturned chair and a broken vase, indicating a struggle may have occurred.
clues.Old oak tree: Footprints leading away from the tree and into the woods where Mary was last seen.
clues.Local bar: A witness remembers seeing Mary having an argument with a man before she vanished.
clues.Library: A book on advanced survival techniques missing from Mary's collection.
